description: The file defines a ViewModel class (NotesViewModel) for managing and observing notes in an Android application. It manages a query state to filter notes and provides methods to set the query and delete notes, interfacing with a NotesRepository.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel that manages the notes list, supports filtering via a query, and handles deletion operations. It uses Kotlin Coroutines and StateFlow for reactive data handling.

methods.name: setQuery
methods.description: Updates the search query used to filter notes by emitting new text into the query flow.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note from the repository based on its ID.
